inventory_service package

Submodules

inventory_service.inventory_app module

class inventory_service.inventory_app.Product(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents a product in the inventory system.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the product (primary key)

  • description (str) – Description of the product

  • category (str) – Category of the product

  • price (float) – Price of the product

  • stock (int) – Stock quantity of the product (default: 0)

  • created_at (datetime) – Timestamp of product creation (default: current UTC time)

  • updated_at (datetime) – Timestamp of last product update (default: current UTC time, auto-updates on modification)

category
created_at
description
name
price
query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

inventory_service.inventory_app.deducting_stock(name)[source]

Deducts 1 unit of stock for a specific product.

Parameters:

name (str) – Name of the product

Returns:

JSON response with a success or error message and updated stock quantity

Return type:

flask.Response
